original_title: 僕をイジメる不良の妹は超生意気なメスガキ！ 『よわよわ雑魚おち×ちんっ いちかのパンツでイけっ、イッちゃえ』
overview: In this edition, Ichika is a schoolgirl on the loose.  A girl who looks innocent but is actually a bully not afraid of inflicting pain.
title: The Delinquent Sister Who Bullies Me Is A Super Cheeky Brat! “Yowayowa Small Fish Omission X Chin Ichika’s Pants Go, Let’s Go” Ichika Matsumoto
